wordGroup: attic salt 高尚的智趣；文雅的机智

sentences.en: We need the steps to get into the attic.
sentences.cn: 我们得踩着梯子才能爬到阁楼上去。

sentences.en: They hid me from the police in their attic.
sentences.cn: 他们把我藏在他们的阁楼上躲避警察。

sentences.en: I've cleared out all that old junk in the attic.
sentences.cn: 我把阁楼里所有的废旧杂物都清除干净了。
